import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var marvelSlice=createSlice({name:"marvel",initialState:{data:[],comicsData:[],heroComicData:[]},reducers:{setData:function setData(state,action){state.data=action.payload;},setHeroComicData:function setHeroComicData(state,action){state.heroComicData=action.payload;},setComicsData:function setComicsData(state,action){state.comicsData.push(action.payload);},clearComicsData:function clearComicsData(state,action){state.comicsData=[];}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
